summary.span: 提供清單可選取項目的數個不同視覺表示。

span.span: Provides several different visual representations for a list of selectable items.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會維護單一或多個選取的項目選取項目。The class maintains the selection of single or multiple selected items. 直接衍生自類別，並沒有任何處理屬性，例如分頁屬性。The is derived directly from the class and does not have any of the pagination handling properties, such as the property. ## Examples 在下列程式碼範例中，屬性類別是初始頁面載入時就會建立值的陣列。In the following code example, the property of the class is an array of values that is created during the initial page load. 您可以變更的設定屬性，以查看不同版本的。You can change the setting of the property to see different versions of a . > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET Web Form 網頁語法概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Syntax Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02). remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要將資料來源繫結至清單，您必須先使用控制項的方法，以確保資料繫結。To bind a data source to a list, you must first use the control's method to ensure data binding. 資料來源可以是型別的，它可以是類型或。The data source can either be of type , or it can be of type . 如果資料來源的類型是，您可以使用欄位來指定要擷取的成員。If the data source is of type , you can use the field to specify which member to extract.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的項目建立控制項和資料繫結，此事件處理常式設定的屬性清單項目從任意的運算式。When an item in a control is created and data-bound, this event handler sets the properties of the list item from arbitrary expressions. 中的項目控制項的型別是。An item in a control is of type . 因為每個資料來源項目所繫結，會引發這個事件。This event is raised as each data source item is bound. 這是篩選或群組的項目的最佳時機集合，利用或屬性。This is the best time to filter or group items of the collection, by using the or property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值是 4;最小值為 1，其沒有最大值。The default value is 4; the minimum is 1, with no maximum. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用回傳以展開清單上的屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property on postback to expand the list. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET Web Form 網頁語法概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Syntax Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02). MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SelectedIndex { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.SelectedIndex : int with get, set

summary.span: 傳回選取項目的索引。

span.span: Returns the index of the selected item.

summary.span: 預設值為 -1。
這個 API 已經過時。
如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.
The index of the selected item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控制項處於多重選取模式，則這個屬性會傳回第一個選取的項目索引。If the control is in multiple selection mode, this property returns the index of the first selected item. 選取的索引無法以宣告方式; 設定使用改為屬性清單的項目。The selected index cannot be set declaratively; use the property of a list item instead. 設定為-1，若要清除選取項目。Set the to -1 to clear the selection. 當您想要以動態方式從清單中移除項目時，這非常有用。This is useful when you want to dynamically remove items from the list.

exception.span: 嘗試將 屬性設為小於 ，或是大於或等於項目數的值。

span.span: an attempt was made to set the property to less than or greater than or equal to the number of items.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event SelectedIndexChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 每當使用者變更 物件的選取範圍時發生。

span.span: Occurs whenever a user changes the selection of a object.

summary.span: 這個 API 已經過時。
如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 變更用戶端上的選取項目不會產生回傳事件。Changing the selection on the client does not generate a postback event. 如果回傳事件由一些其他的控制項產生，並選取項目已變更，會在伺服器上呼叫此事件。This event is called on the server if a postback event is generated by some other control and the selection has changed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用事件。The following code example shows how to use the event. 它也會示範如何使用回傳以展開清單上的屬性。It also shows how to use the property on postback to expand the list. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET Web Form 網頁語法概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Syntax Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileSelectionListSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileSelectionListSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileSelectionListSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileSelectionListSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 傳回選取的項目，如果沒有選取任何項目，則為 。

span.span: Returns the selected item, or if there is no selection.

value.span: 選擇清單中的目前選取項目。

span.span: The currently selected item in the selection list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控制項處於多重選取模式，則這個屬性會傳回第一個選取的項目。If the control is in multiple selection mode, this property returns the first selected item.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::MobileControls::ListSelectType SelectType { System::Web::UI::MobileControls::ListSelectType get(); void set(System::Web::UI::MobileControls::ListSelectType value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定用來提供選擇 UI 的 UI 型別。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of UI used to provide a selection UI.

summary.span: 其型別必須是 。
預設值是 。
這個 API 已經過時。
如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

value.span: 用於提供選擇 UI 的 UI 型別。

span.span: Type of UI used to provide a selection UI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件可以轉譯成`CheckBox`， `DropDown`， `ListBox`， `MultiSelectListBox`，或`Radio`清單中的，視目標裝置而定。A object can be rendered as a `CheckBox`, `DropDown`, `ListBox`, `MultiSelectListBox`, or `Radio` list, depending on the target device. 控制項是否允許使用者選取多個項目，也會影響選取項目類型。The selection type also affects whether the control allows the user to select multiple items. `MultiSelectListBox`和`CheckBox`設定可讓多個選取項目; 其他設定允許單一選取。The `MultiSelectListBox` and `CheckBox` settings allow multiple selections; other settings allow only a single selection. 下表中，會顯示選取項目類型。The selection types are shown in the following table. |`ListSelectType` 值`ListSelectType` value|描述Description|多重選取Multiselect| |----------------------------|-----------------|-----------------| |`CheckBox`|以核取方塊和多重選取功能呈現清單項目。Renders list items with check boxes and multiple selection capability.|[是]Yes| |`DropDown`|在下拉式清單方塊中呈現清單項目。Renders list items in a drop-down list box.|否No| |`ListBox`|在清單方塊中呈現清單項目。Renders list items in a list box.|否No| |`MultipleSelectionListBox`|使用多重選取功能，在清單方塊中呈現清單項目。Renders list items in a list box with multiple selection capability.|[是]Yes| |`Radio`|將清單項目呈現為選項。Renders list items as options.|否No| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用事件。The following code example shows how to use the event. 它也會示範如何使用回傳以展開清單上的屬性。It also shows how to use the property on postback to expand the list. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET Web Form 網頁語法概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Syntax Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileSelectionListSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileSelectionListSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileSelectionListSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileSelectionListSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 導致對伺服器控制項的檢視狀態變更的追蹤 (Tracking)，以便它們能夠儲存於伺服器控制項的 物件。

span.span: Causes tracking of view-state changes to the server control so they can be stored in the server control's object.
